DOC.brief_summary: Persistent detrusor overactivity ( DO ) transurethral prostatectomy result symptomatic failure one third patient . Storage symptom major complaint early postoperative period Holmium Laser Enucleation Prostate ( HoLEP ) . To investigate effect DO patient Benign Prostatic Obstruction ( BPO ) , investigator evaluate change storage symptom follow HoLEP conjunction prescription anticholinergic drug .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Review Comprehensive Case Database HoLEP Procedure Performed Single Surgeon
DOC.detailed_description: Eighty men urodynamically prove BPO underwent HoLEP hospital . All patient evaluate preoperatively International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) , International Continence Society male questionnaire short form ( ICS-SF ) , 3-day frequency - volume chart ( FVC ) , transrectal ultrasonography , uroflowmetry postvoid residual urine volume . The patient divide two group ; BPO without DO ( Non-DO group ) BPO DO ( DO group ) . We assess patient postoperatively 2 week , 1 , 3 6 month surgery .
DOC.criteria: 50 yr great International prostatic symptom score > = 12 Bladder outlet obstruction confirm pressureflow study ( BOOI > 20 ) Patients urologic malignancy prostate cancer bladder cancer Patients underwent urethral , prostate surgery Patients urethral stricture bladder diverticulum bladder neck contracture
